channel.title: A 317 coder please
channel.description: Hey guys! i am looking for a team to help me with my server! ill need a forums creator maybe? i need a coder to help me also! around 2-3! post on this and add me on msn at: gamerz321@hotmail.co.uk if you can help!

item.title: A 317 coder please
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“oldskoolpk, post:9, topic:406332”][quote author=Get Blitz link=topic=503328.msg3683127#msg3683127 date=1311656556]

Absolutely no advertising is allowed in this section. It is simply for recruiting people for your development team. You may discuss development here with your team, as well as discuss other features you plan on developing.

Hmm, what does this mean?

[ul][li]Your need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures).[/li][/ul]

What does this mean? This thread is not a deveolpment thread bacause he has NO detail, NO media, NO proof of his work. He is Requesting for a coder and hoster which you are not allowed to do.
[/quote]

Your point? You just stated the obvious. The main objective to make a development team thread is to recruit people. The problem with this specific thread is that it has no details but he is correct. He wants a coder. which he can recruit from this section.[/quote]He isn’t allowed to just make a thread asking for a coder/hoster, God damn what don’t you understand about that.

Read full topic

item.title: A 317 coder please
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

HE CAN NOT ASK FOR A CODER OR A HOSTER People can apply if they want to but he cannot ask them to.

Read full topic

item.title: A 317 coder please
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“oldskoolpk, post:4, topic:406332”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=503328.msg3682409#msg3682409 date=1311626049]
You’re not aloud to request a programmer/hoster.
This isn’t even a development thread?
[/quote]

Development Teams are for requesting programmers, dumbass.

O.T: Add information/media about the server to a high enough standard. But, unfortunately. You can’t request a hoster so you will need to learn to portfoward or buy a VPS.[/quote]
Maybe if you read the rule’s dumb ass, it state’s

[hr]

Requesting a host, 'coder'/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

Read full topic
